name: Dos Botones (Indie Dev Jam en Español #10)
name_original: Dos Botones (Indie Dev Jam en Español #10)
description:
Dos Botones (Indie Dev Jam en Español #10) is a simulation-platformer game developed by ElSaMo13. It came out on 28-06-2020.
Dos Botones (Indie Dev Jam en Español #10) is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
